class ShiftProperties[source]

ShiftProperties(name:str, starting_hour:timedelta, duration:timedelta)

ShiftProperties(name: str, starting_hour: datetime.timedelta, duration: datetime.timedelta)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Shift[source]

Shift(properties:ShiftProperties, date:datetime)

Shift(properties: roster2ical.roster.ShiftProperties, date: datetime.datetime)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
sp = ShiftProperties(
    name="Früh1", starting_hour=timedelta(hours=8), duration=timedelta(hours=8)
)
f1 = Shift(properties=sp, date=datetime(2022, 1, 17, tzinfo=ZoneInfo("Europe/Berlin")))
f1.beginning

datetime.datetime(2022, 1, 17, 8, 0, tzinfo=zoneinfo.ZoneInfo(key='Europe/Berlin'))
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

class Roster[source]

Roster(shifts:list[Shift], name:str='Jane Doe', _year:int=2022, _month:int=1)

Roster(shifts: list, name: str = 'Jane Doe', _year: int = 2022, _month: int = 1)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from pathlib import Path

_abbr2shiftproperties = {
    "F1": ShiftProperties(
        name="Früh1", starting_hour=timedelta(hours=8), duration=timedelta(hours=8)
    ),
    "N1": ShiftProperties(
        name="Nacht1", starting_hour=timedelta(hours=22), duration=timedelta(hours=10)
    ),
}
r = Roster.from_dict(
    {
        "Mo 01": "F1",
        "Di 02": "N1",
    },
    mapper=_abbr2shiftproperties,
)
c = r.to_ics()
print(c.events)

with (Path.cwd() / "data" / "output" / "example.ics").open("w") as f:
    f.write(str(r.to_ics()))

{<Event 'Nacht1' begin:2022-01-02T22:00:00+01:00 end:2022-01-03T08:00:00+01:00>, <Event 'Früh1' begin:2022-01-01T08:00:00+01:00 end:2022-01-01T16:00:00+01:00>}
{% endraw %}
